sentences.sContent: a small group on the fringes of the art world
sentences.sCn: 艺术界边缘的一个小群体

phrases.pCn: 电视接收边缘区；边缘地区；干扰区域
条纹反差；干涉条纹对比；条纹衬比度条

words.tran: 具流苏的，具的（等于fringy）；加穗的；带边饰的

trans.tranOther: not completely belonging to or accepted by a group of people who share the same job, activities etc
a group, event etc that is less important or popular than the main group etc, or whose opinions are not accepted by most other people involved in the same activity
